contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox company | name = Daleside Brewery | logo = [[Image:DalesideLogo.png|150px]] | caption = Daleside Logo | location_city = [[Harrogate]], [[Yorkshire]], |location_country = England | owner = | foundation = 1988 | production = | active_beers = | seasonal_beers = | other_beers = }} '''Daleside''' is an independent [[brewery]] founded in 1988 in [[Harrogate]], [[North Yorkshire]], [[England]]. ==Products== Daleside produce a wide range of beers, including Morocco Ale, a traditional spiced beer based on an Elizabethan recipe;<ref>[http://www.levenshall.co.uk/main/ale.htm Levens Hall - Secret Recipe Elizabethan Ale<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> Old Legover, a low [[Alcohol by volume|abv]] Old Ale;<ref>[http://www.legendslimited.com/legover.html Legends, Ltd. - Old Legover<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> Monkey Wrench, a stronger Old Ale; Ripon Jewel, a strong pale ale; and Duff, a 5% abv dark ale. 'Duff' sounds like 'dubh' Gaelic for "Dark". ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.dalesidebrewery.com/index.php Daleside Brewery] *[http://www.ratebeer.com/Brewers/daleside/1001/ RateBeer] [[Category:Beer and breweries in England]] [[category: Breweries in Yorkshire]] [[Category:Yorkshire cuisine]] [[Category:Companies established in 1988]] [[Category:Companies based in Harrogate]] {{beer-stub}}
